DOC.detailed_description: Study population consist child bear center ( Hospital Materno-Infantil Malaga ) 2006 . Our hospital tertiary center Spanish national health system born 7465 child , represent 41.2 % baby bear province , 7246 delivery year 21 . Random sample size estimate 400 , 95 % confidence level 20 % power , consider expect RR 0.82 22 , ratio expose unexposed group 1.5 , 20 % loss .
